data.actual_result: The underscore and the space appear correctly, but the emoji doesn't appear. Instead, it gives a string of numbers
data.expected_result: The message appears as an underscore, the space, and the emoji.
data.short_description: When trying to send a message which starts with an underscore, then follows with a space, and then with an emoji which the name of ends with an underscore, it completely glitches.
data.steps_to_repro: Find or make an emoji which the name of ends with an underscore. In my case, it's <:o_:422323233623375873> Then, send a message in the following syntax: an underscore, a space, and the emoji ending with an underscore. In my case, `_ <:o_:422323233623375873>`.
